

.. _hardware-index:

Hardware
========

.. collapsible:: Ftdi

   .. driverbox:: FT232H
      :summary: General Purpose USB to GPIO, SPI, I2C
      :badge: warning
      :badgetext: beta
      :ref: generated/Ftdi/FT232H.html
   
   
.. collapsible:: Analog Devices

   .. driverbox:: DS18B20
      :summary: Temperature Sensor -55°C to 125°C
      :badge: warning
      :badgetext: beta
      :ref: generated/analog_devices/DS18B20.html
   
   
.. collapsible:: Adafruit

   https://www.adafruit.com/product/2264
   
   The implementation https://github.com/eblot/pyftdi supports simultaneous use of SPI and GPIO pins.
   Unfortunately it is based on using bitmasks for everything.
   
   
   .. driverbox:: FT232H
      :summary: General Purpose USB to GPIO, SPI, I2C
      :badge: warning
      :badgetext: beta
      :ref: generated/ftdi/FT232H.html
   
   
.. collapsible:: Gamma Vacuum

   .. driverbox:: SPC (Ethernet)
      :summary: Ion getter pump controlled by digitel SPCe controller
      :badge: warning
      :badgetext: beta
      :ref: generated/gamma_vacuum/EthernetSPC.html
   
   
   .. driverbox:: SPC (Serial)
      :summary: Ion getter pump controlled by digitel SPCe controller
      :badge: warning
      :badgetext: beta
      :ref: generated/gamma_vacuum/SerialSPC.html
   
   
.. collapsible:: Hamamatsu Photonics

   .. driverbox:: DCAM Camera
      :summary: Camera compatible with the Hamamatsu DCAM API
      :badge: warning
      :badgetext: beta
      :ref: generated/hamamatsu/DcamCompatibleCamera.html
   
   
.. collapsible:: HighFinesse GmbH

   .. driverbox:: WSx
      :summary: First generation WS wavelength meter with optional 8 channel switch
      :badge: warning
      :badgetext: beta
      :ref: generated/highfinesse/WSx.html
   
   
.. collapsible:: IDS Imaging Development Systems

   IDS is an industrial camera manufacturer and offers high-performance area scan cameras with USB or GigE interfaces
   as well as 3D cameras with a wide range of sensors and variants.
   
   
   .. driverbox:: IDS Peak Camera
      :summary: Camera compatible with the IDS Peak driver
      :badge: warning
      :badgetext: beta
      :ref: generated/ids/PeakCompatibleCamera.html
   
   
.. collapsible:: Pico Technology

   .. driverbox:: 6000 Series
      :summary: Deep memory MSO USB oscilloscope
      :badge: warning
      :badgetext: beta
      :ref: generated/picotechnology/Picoscope6000a.html
   
   
.. collapsible:: Rigol Technologies

   .. driverbox:: RigolDSA
      :summary: DSA series spectrum analyzer
      :badge: warning
      :badgetext: beta
      :ref: generated/rigol/RigolDSA.html
   
   
.. collapsible:: Rohde Schwarz

   .. driverbox:: NGX
      :summary: Rohde Schwarz NGX Power Supply
      :badge: warning
      :badgetext: beta
      :ref: generated/rohde_schwarz/NGX.html
   
   
.. collapsible:: SAES Getters

   .. driverbox:: NEXTorr
      :summary: Non-evaporable getter pump controlled by NEG Power Multi-controller
      :badge: warning
      :badgetext: beta
      :ref: generated/saes/NEXTorr.html
   
   
.. collapsible:: Santec Corporation

   .. driverbox:: SLM-200
      :summary: 120Hz Full-HD LCOS SLM
      :badge: warning
      :badgetext: beta
      :ref: generated/santec/SLM200.html
   
   
.. collapsible:: Sinara Open Hardware Project

   .. driverbox:: Booster
      :summary: Modular 8-channel RF power amplifier
      :badge: bad
      :badgetext: alpha
      :ref: generated/sinara/Booster.html
   
   
.. collapsible:: Stanford Research Systems (SRS)

   .. driverbox:: PTC10
      :summary: Programmable temperature controller
      :badge: warning
      :badgetext: beta
      :ref: generated/srs/PTC10.html
   
   
.. collapsible:: Teledyne Technologies

   .. driverbox:: Kinetix
      :summary: High speed sCMOS camera
      :badge: warning
      :badgetext: beta
      :ref: generated/teledyne/Kinetix.html
   
   
   .. driverbox:: PVCam Camera
      :summary: Generic PVCam compatible camera
      :badge: warning
      :badgetext: beta
      :ref: generated/teledyne/PvcamCamera.html
   
   
.. collapsible:: Texas Instruments

   .. driverbox:: ADS1256
      :summary: 24-Bit, 30kSPS, 8-Ch Delta-Sigma ADC
      :badge: bad
      :badgetext: alpha
      :ref: generated/texas_instruments/ADS1256.html
   
   
.. collapsible:: Toptica Photonics

   .. driverbox:: BoosTAPro
      :summary: High-Power Tapered Laser Amplifier
      :badge: warning
      :badgetext: beta
      :ref: generated/toptica/BoosTAPro.html
   
   
   .. driverbox:: DLPro
      :summary: Tunable external cavity diode lasers for cooling and controlling all atoms and ions
      :badge: warning
      :badgetext: beta
      :ref: generated/toptica/DLPro.html
   
   
   .. driverbox:: TAPro
      :summary: Tapered Amplifier Laser System
      :badge: warning
      :badgetext: beta
      :ref: generated/toptica/TAPro.html
   
   
   .. driverbox:: TASHGPro
      :summary: High-power, tunable, frequency-doubled diode laser
      :badge: warning
      :badgetext: beta
      :ref: generated/toptica/TASHGPro.html
   
   
.. collapsible:: Windfreak Technologies, LLC

   .. driverbox:: SynthUSBII
      :summary: 34.4MHz - 4.4GHz USB RF Signal Generator
      :badge: good
      :badgetext: stable
      :ref: generated/windfreak/SynthUSBII.html
   
   
   .. driverbox:: SynthUSBIII
      :summary: 12.5MHz - 6.4GHz USB RF Signal Generator
      :badge: good
      :badgetext: stable
      :ref: generated/windfreak/SynthUSBIII.html
   
   
.. collapsible:: Generic

   .. driverbox:: GPIO Input
      :summary: Generic GPIO based standard linux kernel interface
      :badge: warning
      :badgetext: beta
      :ref: generated/gpio/GPIOInput.html
   
   
   .. driverbox:: GPIO Output
      :summary: Generic GPIO based standard linux kernel interface
      :badge: warning
      :badgetext: beta
      :ref: generated/gpio/GPIOOutput.html
